item.description:
Hi friends,

How are you?
This is a holiday season, maybe you all have the plan to take a vacation or visit family or stay at home! wish you have a great day.

I like to meet everyone before get into a crazy and out of control shopping guy. So we can find inner peace even during this busy life schedule.

In the December meeting, we will continue to discuss inner peace and how to practice in our daily life. We can share from different back ground's point of view. I found out in every month's discussion, it make my spiritual life elevate a lot! Thank you for all of your sharing.

I like to meet all of you and we can let the peaceful energy spread to every where of world.

Sincerely to invite all of you for this month's discussion before the end of 2007

Wish you all have a peaceful day
item.name: December meetup
